titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of a Borrower's Card: Irma le Gallienne and Richard le Gallienne

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards s1: Dec 12 = "Preen"? s2: Aug 22 = "Cindon"? Nov 5 = "Shamefaced"? s3: Dec 10 = no idea, crossed out Dec 31 = no idea Jan 23 = "Gallery"? s5: "Poev"? Aug 14 = "extra Colom"? Aug 17 = blotted out s6: Dec 20 = "tins & Robbes"? May 23 = note after "3 vol" not decipherable May 23 = "Fity Manis a-Kelley"?

div.note:
1927 Mr. Richard Le Gallienne 89 rue de Vaugirard
May 2d. S.R. 1m 1 vol 1 = to June 2d 25
Deposit 50
June 4 S.R. to July 2d. 2 vols 35 other Deposit 50

ab.bibl: Wings of the Dove in 2 vols.

div.note: May 14 S.R. from May 2d 1928 to August 2d 1928 = 85f.
(Modern Library ed. of Forerunner to be put away)

div.head: LE GALLIENNE subs to 1929 February 2

bibl.title: Great Short Stories of the World

ab.note: Miss S.B. says must have been BB. Jan 12

div.note: Miss Beach says History of N Pirates subscription not brought back

ab.bibl: The History of Don Quixote in 3 vol.

ab.note: Mr LeG. says has B.B. Dec 17

div.note: Monsieur Richard Le Galienne Hotel Belle Viel el d'Italie Menton a.m.
subs to be renewed Sept 16 1931 to time Mr LeGallienne leaves

bibl.title: The Romance of the Paris Streets
Life Work and Evil Fate of Maupassant
